comment: Pros : A ton of good songs. Cons : It's so annoying when I click on my playlist, and some random song starts playing. Like, I want to listen to MY music, not whatever Spotify is adding for me. It would totally be 5 stars if Spotify would take out that feature, cause I don't want to pay 30 dollars a month just to listen to ONLY my music.
scenarios: A random song starts playing instead of the selected song from the user's playlist when the playlist is clicked.
key sentence: A random song starts playing instead of the selected song from the user's playlist when the playlist is clicked.
the function of activity: The activity involves searching, library function(playlist/artist), playing/pausing items, viewing downloaded songs/podcasts, downloading songs or podcasts, adding to playlists, shuffling a playlist, previewing episodes, type replies to episodes and accessing history page, setting page
the sub-task list of state: [{'name': 'Search Playlist', 'description': 'Search item in playlist.'}, {'name': 'Create Playlist', 'description': 'Create a new playlist'}, {'name': 'Show Grid View', 'description': 'Switch to grid view'}, {'name': 'Play', 'description': 'Start playback of the currently selected item'}, {'name': 'Item Added', 'description': 'Indication that an item has been successfully added'}, {'name': 'View recently played tracks', 'description': 'View recent items'}, {'name': 'Liked Songs', 'description': 'View liked songs'}, {'name': 'Podcasts', 'description': 'View podcasts Playlist'}, {'name': 'Artists', 'description': 'View Playlist by artists'}, {'name': 'Downloaded', 'description': 'View downloaded items'}, {'name': 'Sort or Change View Mode', 'description': 'Change sorting options or view mode'}, {'name': 'Now Playing Bar', 'description': 'View the currently playing track'}]

operations.event: click<button id=30 class ="com.spotify.music:id/row_root" alt="My playlist #2, Playlist • Testing, Downloaded, ">  </button>
